name: Hell Ja!
description:
HELL Ja!
Your highness the rat king ended up in hell and the place is tiny.
Make thyself some room!

Made for Ludum Dare 38 Theme: small world in under 3 Days
Play in full-screen please :)
Controller: (A) for dodge attack
Keyboard: [ctrl] for dodge attack
movement: W,A,S,D or Arrow key

Game Design: Ting
Coding: Nepomuzzle
Sound: Mpyrn
Character/Animation: McMelon
Environment/Slime-Animation: Nemo

Thanks for checkin out our awful amazingly awesome game!
We actually kinda like it because it was fun to make and it is ours!
Hölle Hölle Hölle! Jawoll!
